commit message: Updates from updating updates with the updated updates.
Don't try to stop a track unless it's playing
Moved buffer allocation into constructor instead of reallocating it every play
Fixed major memory leak; should improve responsiveness on older devices, too.
Changed cent sign to 'c'; C64 font doesn't have it; nor fallback 'Droid' on older devices (shows blank box)
Added default case to appease FindBugs
